content:
That's great to hear! It sounds like you had a productive and enjoyable experience at TechConnect. Attending industry events like TechConnect is an excellent way to network with professionals from top companies like Google and Facebook.

It's fantastic that you got to meet Sarah from Google and her colleague Alex from the AI department. Google is a leader in AI research and development, and Alex must have shared some fascinating insights into their work. Did you get a chance to discuss any specific AI-related projects or initiatives that Google is working on?

Reconnecting with Tom, your old colleague, is also a great outcome. It's always valuable to maintain relationships with former colleagues, as they can provide valuable insights into their new company and industry. Facebook is another giant in the tech industry, and Tom's experience there could be a great resource for you.

Did you discuss any potential collaborations or opportunities with Sarah, Alex, or Tom? It's essential to follow up with new connections and nurture those relationships to see where they might lead.

Remember to also follow up with the people you met at TechConnect on LinkedIn and other professional networks. This will help you stay connected and potentially open up new opportunities in the future.

What were some of the most interesting or surprising things you learned or discussed at TechConnect? Were there any particular topics or trends that stood out to you?
